description:
Manages Cost and Usage Report Definitions.

~> *NOTE:* The AWS Cost and Usage Report service is only available in `us-east-1` currently.

~> *NOTE:* If AWS Organizations is enabled, only the master account can use this resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AdditionalArtifacts.description: A list of additional artifacts. Valid values are: REDSHIFT, QUICKSIGHT.

AdditionalSchemaElements.description: A list of schema elements. Valid values are: RESOURCES.

Compression.description: Compression format for report. Valid values are: GZIP, ZIP.

Format.description: Format for report. Valid values are: textORcsv.

ReportName.description: Unique name for the report. Must start with a number/letter and is case sensitive. Limited to 256 characters.

S3Bucket.description: Name of the existing S3 bucket to hold generated reports.

S3Prefix.description: Report path prefix. Limited to 256 characters.

S3Region.description: Region of the existing S3 bucket to hold generated reports.

TimeUnit.description: The frequency on which report data are measured and displayed.  Valid values are: HOURLY, DAILY.
